result.arabic_text: ۞ وَعَنَتِ ٱلۡوُجُوهُ لِلۡحَيِّ ٱلۡقَيُّومِۖ وَقَدۡ خَابَ مَنۡ حَمَلَ ظُلۡمٗا
result.translation: (111) And [all] faces will be humbled before the Ever-Living, the Self-Sustaining.[858] And he will have failed who carries injustice.[859]
result.footnotes:
[858]- See footnotes describing these attributes in 2:255.
[859]- i.e., sin or wrongdoing towards Allāh or any of His creation.
